Package shapes

Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.McShape
      • shapes.Polygon
  • public class Polygon
extends McShape
    The Polygon extends the abstract shape class McShape to give more customisation and control over the object. The class encapsulates the idea of a polygon object in double precision. The class uses Path2D.Double to paint the object to the screen

    • Constructor Detail

      • Polygon

        public Polygon​(double XPoly,
               double YPoly,
               java.awt.Color edge,
               java.awt.Color fill,
               int canvasSize)
        Constructs and initialises a Polygon with the specified coordinates, colours, and screen dimensions.
        Parameters:
        XPoly - An array of X coordinate of the Polygon
        YPoly - An array of X coordinate of the Polygon
        edge - The edge colour of the Polygon
        fill - The fill colour, if any, of the Polygon
        canvasSize - The current size of the canvas

      • Polygon

        public Polygon​(java.lang.String values,
               java.awt.Color edgecolour,
               java.awt.Color fillcolour)
        Constructs and initialises a Polygon from a saved file with the specified values and colours.
        Parameters:
        values - A string of XY coordinates describing all X and Y coordinates in the Polygon
        edgecolour - The edge colour of the Polygon
        fillcolour - The fill colour, if any, of the Polygon
